description:
Luffy makes short work of face from his past, and Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner`s swords hovering above Ace`s head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La force d`une promesse. Luffy et Kobby s`affrontent
To Live Up to a Promise! Luffy and Coby Collide!
Yakusoku no Tame ni!! Gekitou! Luffy to Coby
Сдержать обещание! Столкновение Луффи и Коби!
بغاية الوفاء بوعد! اشتباك لوفي وكوبي!
約束のために!! 激闘! ルフィとコビー
